title: Lentil salad with tomatoes and feta cheese
ingredients: ['500g green lentils', '1 bay leaf', '60ml extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '3 tablespoons minced parsley', '2 tablespoons minced fresh oregano', '1 small red onion, minced', '4 tomatoes, diced', '200g feta cheese, diced', 'salt and pepper', 'toasted pine nuts (optional)']
